services.title: Mountain Biking & Skills Course
services.text: Miles of mountain biking trails cut through the dramatic mountain desert, offering technical terrain for professional and novice mountain bikers alike. Our 5,000-square-foot skills development course gives bikers the opportunity to improve their precision on our top-of-the-line Scott Bikes, and professional guides are also on hand to provide personalized instruction.

services.title: Paintball
services.text: As the ultimate adrenaline-fueled playground, our paintball course is where members go all-out while competing with friends and family. You won’t just be dodging flying paintballs – obstacles include an abandoned boat, smoke bombs, and trip wires to make any game a true battle.

services.title: Archery & Axe Throwing
services.text: Whether your instrument of choice is bow and arrow or axe, fully equipped archery and axe-throwing ranges await for you to sharpen your aim with a series of multiple targets. Members love to compete for glory on these courses in our very own Twin Dolphin Club Mini-Olympics.

services.title: Hiking Trails
services.text: With over 1,100 acres and 10 miles of terrain, our hiking trails are much more than a walk in the park. Hikers are surrounded by unique desert flora, canyon-like arroyos, and unparalleled vistas on the onsite trail system, or those craving ocean views can hop on a dune buggy to access El Cielo viewpoint palapa and trails overlooking the Sea of Cortez.

testimony.name: Marcellina C.
testimony.text: I like Hotel more and more each day because it makes my life a lot easier

testimony.name: Donal H
testimony.text: Thanks guys, keep up the good work! Routes is both attractive and highly adaptable.

testimony.name: Arnold L
testimony.text: Thanks guys, keep up the good work! Paintball has completely surpassed our expectations. I will recommend you to my colleagues.

testimony.name: Douglas R
testimony.text: Archery is the next killer app. I couldn't have asked for more than this. The very best. Archery was the best investment I ever made.

testimony.name: Cathlene X
testimony.text: We're loving it. Mountain bike is worth much more than I paid.

testimony.name: Bridgett O
testimony.text: This is simply unbelievable! I would also like to say thank you to all your staff

testimony.name: Auroora A
testimony.text: If you aren't sure, always go for mountain bike. Thanks to mountain bike, we've just launched our 5th website!

testimony.name: Quintilla B
testimony.text: Mountain bike is the most valuable business resource we have EVER purchased. Just what I was looking for

testimony.name: Aurea D
testimony.text: Mountain bike should be nominated for service of the year

testimony.name: Brook X
testimony.text: Definitely worth the investment. I would be lost without mountain bike. Mountain bike is exactly what our business has been lacking.

testimony.name: Josef U
testimony.text: Not able to tell you how happy I am with golf.
